title: Medication record

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a medication record, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a front elevational view of a medication record showing my new design, in closed condition;
FIG. 2 is a back elevational view thereof, in closed condition;
FIG. 3 is a top plan view thereof, in closed condition;
FIG. 4 is a side elevational view thereof, in closed condition;
FIG. 5 is a front elevational view thereof, in open condition;
FIG. 6 is a left lateral view thereof, in an open condition;
FIG. 7 is a right lateral view thereof, in an open condition; and,
FIG. 8 is a top plan view thereof, in an open condition.
All sides not shown in the drawing disclosure forms no part of the claimed design.
The broken line showing of open fields without indicia are included for the purpose of illustrating portions of the article and forms no part of the claimed design.
